name: Arachnys
description:
Arachnys is a technology company specialising in intelligent risk and compliance. What makes us different is that we offer unparalleled control of truly global data. We are the only way to make sure your team see exactly the data they need, retrieved and translated in real-time from the widest collection available worldwide, to empower your decision making in the most efficient and auditable way possible. 

The Arachnys platform is used by several of the world’s largest investment banks, consulting & law firms as well as corporates. 

*What we are doing*		 	 	 		
- Maintaining a 120TB+ news cluster, enabling millions of searches a day
- Entity matching and scoring across structured and unstructured data
- Pioneering algorithms for precision searching
- Structured, and semi-automated data extraction from complex web pages
- Distributed, highly-available process automation framework

team.name: David Buxton
team.bioHtml: Founder @Arachnys, @Arachnys Information Services • Studied at @University of Oxford

team.title: Director, Product Management
team.name: Nate Soffio
team.bioHtml: GPM @Arachnys | Alum: @Cxense • @AltaClaro • @Attivio • @Relationship Science | @Yale University 2010

team.title: Product Manager
team.name: Timothy Dewis-Goodman
team.bioHtml: Lead BA experienced in driving successful implementations for enterprise customers.Recently relocated to New York to develop & lead the US BA function

jobs.title: Technical Lead
jobs.description:
Arachnys is a workflow automation platform to analyse and prevent financial crime. We produce and maintain an enterprise-grade platform, enabling banks and multinationals to handle risks more efficiently and onboard customers, suppliers and partners. Our partners include global top-10 banks, big four advisory firms and large multinationals.

We work predominantly with Python, Django, JavaScript, React, and Docker. Our infrastructure is backed by Kubernetes, Hadoop, ElasticSearch, Terraform, and Amazon Web Services.

Requirements:
Experience leading a team of engineers, including line management
5+ years web development
Strong knowledge in Python and web development
Experience with Docker and infrastructure

What’s different about us?
Team of smart, collaborative people working together to solve hard, interesting problems for real customers.
Anyone can get involved with any part of our system — front-end developers can write Hadoop jobs if they fancy.
We have a committed focus on delivering quality, while not being scared of pushing back on customer demands. (A top bank recently told us that we were the first supplier that had asked them, "Why?" about their requirements.)

What hard problems are we solving?
High frequency media monitoring with Big Data
We are maintaining a news cluster of a 120TB+ that we do millions of searches a day against in addition to searches against numerous data integration partners 
Entity matching, and scoring across both structured, and unstructured data
We are pioneering algorithms for precision searching, and reconciliation of risk relevant information across our news data, and third party datasets (see: https://www.slideshare.net/charliejuggler/finding-the-bad-actor-custom-scoring-forensic-name-matching-with-elasticsearch)
Structured, and semi-automated data extraction from complex web pages
We are engineering a multi-purpose Chrome extension to seamlessly automate complex data collection processes
Distributed, highly-available process automation framework
We are developing a plug-n-play platform to ease the codification, and hence, the automation / structuring of repetitive business processes

What's great about our culture?
We work hard but it’s never “Crunch-Time” for us. No sleeping under desks or 14-hour days.
We use the best technology to solve problems, whether it’s something new or something established.

What benefits do we have?
Weekly training sessions where one of the team presents a new technology or we watch and discuss a talk from experts
We’re paired with a great L&D start-up, Wonderwerk
Regular company wide social lunches, events, talks, parties and culture club
Bonus.ly - Our in-house micro rewards scheme redeemable for haircuts, spotify memberships and much more
We’ve got great infrastructure for working from home (easy to drop-in hangouts, a lot of communication over chat and Github)
Great collaborative environment. Everyone wants to improve and get better at coding.
